On the first day of Christmas
my true love sent to me:
A Partridge in a Pear Tree

18 18 second 18 18 18
18 18 18 18 18 18:
Two Turtle Doves
and 19 21 21 3 21 21

21 21 third 21 21 21
21 21 21 21 21 21:
Three French Hens
24 24 24
24 22 24 24 3 24 24

24 24 fourth 24 24 24
24 24 24 24 24 24:
Four Calling Birds*
27 27 27
27 27 27
27 25 27 27 3 27 27

27 27 fifth 27 27 27
27 27 27 27 27 27:
Five Golden Rings
30 30 30
30 30 30
30 30 30
30 28 30 30 3 30 30

30 30 sixth 30 30 30
30 30 30 30 30 30:
Six Geese 17 Laying
33 33 33
33 33 33
33 33 33
33 33 33
33 15 33 33 3 33 33

33 33 seventh 33 33 33
33 33 33 33 33 33:
Seven Swans 17 Swimming

36 36 eighth 36 36 36
36 36 36 36 36 36:
